pocket_id.description: The pocket account id Validations: - pocket_account_id must be greater than 0

smart_goal.description: The smart goal to create Validations: - cannot be nil hence required

start_date.description: the time the goal was created

end_date.description: the time the goal was updated

financial_integration_service_api.v1.Bud.title: Budget
financial_integration_service_api.v1.Bud.description: The Budgets table stores information about each budget created by the user, including the name of the budget, the start and end dates, and the user ID.

subcategories.description: the sub categories of the category

financial_integration_service_api.v1.Cat.title: Category
financial_integration_service_api.v1.Cat.description: The Categories table stores information about the different categories of expenses or income, such as "Housing", "Food", "Transportation", and "Entertainment". Each category has one or more subcategories, which are stored in the Subcategories table. For example, the "Housing" category might have subcategories for "Rent", "Utilities", and "Home Maintenance".

forecasted_amount.description: the forecasted amount of the goal

forecasted_completion_date.description: the forecasted completion date of the goal

variance_amount.description: the forecasted variance of the goal between the forecasted and target amounts

financial_integration_service_api.v1.For.title: Forecast
financial_integration_service_api.v1.For.description: The Forecast table stores information about each forecast generated for a particular goal, including the forecast date, the forecasted amount of money saved or invested for the goal by the target date, and the variance between the forecasted and target amounts. This allows the user to track how well they are progressing towards their goal and make adjustments as needed.

name.description: The name of the milestone Validations: - must be at least 3 characters long

description.description: The description of the miletone Validations: - must be at least 3 characters long

target_date.description: the target date of the milestone Validations: - must be at least 3 characters long

target_amount.description: the target amount of the milestone

is_completed.description: wethe milestone is completed or not

budget.description: the budget associated with the milestone

financial_integration_service_api.v1.Mil.title: Milestone
financial_integration_service_api.v1.Mil.description: Milestone: represents a milestone in the context of simfinni. A financial milestone that is both smart and achievable. A milestone is a sub goal of a goal and is tied to a goal by the goal id

user_id.description: the user id to which this goal is tied to

name.description: The name of the goal Validations: - must be at least 3 characters long

description.description: The description of the goal Validations: - must be at least 3 characters long

is_completed.description: wether the goal has been achieved or not

start_date.description: the start date of the goal

end_date.description: the end date of the goal

target_amount.description: the target amount of the goal amount of money the user wants to save or invest

current_amount.description: the current amount of the goal current amount of money saved or invested towards the goal

financial_integration_service_api.v1.Sma.title: Smart Goal
financial_integration_service_api.v1.Sma.description: SmartGoal: The Goals table stores information about each financial goal, including the name of the goal, its description, the target amount of money the user wants to save or invest, and the expected date of completion. The Goals table also includes columns for the start date of the goal, the current amount of money saved or invested towards the goal, and a boolean flag indicating whether the goal has been achieved. These additional columns allow the user to track their progress towards the goal and see how much more they need to save or invest to reach their target amount.
